tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk any of you out smelling this? Let me tell you inside my home is a million times worse than out there you are allowing us to be poisoned @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off CLOSE IT DOWN

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency It's not just bad it is totally out of control something very serious must have happed at the site to cause these extremes of gases. It feels literally like a wall and it is extremely scary @StinkStopthe

@HelenVi00175623 @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland @StaffordshireCC @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg Totally agree, very scary tonight, not like all the others, seems massive gas leak, hope @ClareDInnisEA is there right now to #stopthestink

The last time the toxic fumes were this bad the @EnvAgency "forgot" to switch the monitoring equipment on. This time the ics email has stopped working. @EnvAgency Too many coincidences, @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL What the hell is going on at @EnvAgency!

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off I can't believe it's been allowed to go on for so many years and the community has been ignored time & time again. They are "acutely aware" of our concerns and yet continue to accept more waste, causing further odour and sleep deprivation. Sleep deprivation is a form of torture.

@hopeternalall @EventbriteUK @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids It certainly won't be much fun if tonights unleashing of a tsunami of toxic landfill gases is anything to go by üò¢ It's a shame we used to have a market town to be proud of. @StinkStopthe

tweets.text: So @EventbriteUK you're planning Funtopia in Newcastle under Lyme 19th May. Not sure how much fun its going to be with toxic fug, are you aware of the heaving pile of leaching landfill @StinkStopthe, sorry its late I'm on hold to the @EnvAgencyMids again with a home full of gas! https://t.co/j3d5u47Ufp

The people of Newcastle subjected to a Saturday night stink as usual courtesy of @RedIndustries2 good job they did all that capping to solve the problem isn't it @EnvAgency? #stopthestink https://t.co/LIRC09yAng

Unsurprisingly half of Staffordshire left the county on #staffordshireday due to the landfill fumes. It‚Äôs a real shame because this is the reality most weekends for all my local friends & we aren‚Äôt spending money here  @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @NewsNBC https://t.co/RSVlPBcDGc
The Earth is the only planet we have. Therefore, it's our responsibility to tend it passionately! A green generation is achievable. @UNEP @FMEnvng @EnvAgency #HappyEarthDay #echoheroes #ClimateAction

tweets.text: The @EnvAgency can't even get an email address that works. Please call 0800 80 70 60 to report the stink. https://t.co/24igWAaWhv

@ClareDinnisEA you spoke to @AaronBell4NUL, perhaps you would like to inform him and the residents of Newcastle-under-Lyme why the @EnvAgency‚Äôs technology is so poor? First the monitoring station isn‚Äôt active during the worst weekend. Now your email ‚Äúbreaks‚Äù so we can‚Äôt report.

You can‚Äôt make this up. The email for reporting to the @EnvAgency has now ‚Äúbroken‚Äù so you need to call to report the stink. This is very convenient as most people have been told to email in; emails hold more sway in a court of law. @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA what is happening?
@AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency Never mind picking up phones. You're our MP sort this shit up. Local Elections May 6.
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency It's bad mate.
@Cap_it_off @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL Thank you for flagging. Update posted on our Walleys Quarry website. Phones operating as normal. https://t.co/6B9i1x2fA0

@StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL They have also been on site today (01/05/21) inspecting the ineffectiveness of the capping... something is seriously wrong #stopthestink  Walley Landfill still out of control
